text: Nová scéna theatre building in Bratislava New Scene (Slovak: Nová scéna, abr. ND) is a theatre located in Bratislava, the capital of Slovakia. == See also == * Slovak National Theatre * Slovak culture * Park One == External links == * Official site Category:Theatres in Bratislava Category:Culture in Bratislava Category:Buildings and structures in Bratislava
title: New Scene
